participant_2.background:
I write in my journal to clear my head.
my favorite movie genre is horror.
I miss my family terribly, but I am happy with my new life.
I love to listen to the avert brother while working on cases for the federal court.
i have 2 sisters.

content.text: Hi! I am doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am a graphic designer and I work for myself. What do you do for a living?
I am a lawyer for the federal court. It is a lot of work, but I enjoy it!
That sounds like an interesting job! I do not know much about the law, but I am sure it is very challenging.
It can be, but it is also very rewarding. I love helping people and making a difference in the world.
That is great! I am glad that you find your job rewarding. I love to do graphic design, and it is very rewarding for me to see my work come to life.
That is awesome! I am sure you are very good at your job.
Thank you! I try my best. What are your hobbies?
I love to write in my journal to clear my head. I also love to watch horror movies and listen to the Avett Brothers.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I love to read and listen to music. Do you have any siblings?
Yes, I have two sisters. We are all very close and we love to spend time together.
That's great! I have a younger brother and we are also very close.
It is so nice to have siblings. They are always there for you, no matter what.
Yes, they are! I am so glad that I have them.
Me too! I am glad that we had this conversation. It was nice to meet you!
Yes, it was nice to meet you too! I hope we can talk again soon.
